room_title: Escape room "Bank Heist" by Mastermind Escape Games in Chicago
room_address: 1015 E State Pkwy Suite 200 Schaumburg, IL 60173
room_description: As your final test to become a part of a world-renowned crime syndicate, you have to rob the Schaumburg bank. Your boss will distract the guards and cops for an hour. The task is not just to escape, but to steal as much cash as possible.
